item.title: What is Blockchain Technology?
item.description: MathJax Test $$\int x^3 dx$$ Code highlighting Test import pandas as pd import numpy as np # for Box-Cox Transformation from scipy import stats # for min_max scaling from mlxtend.preprocessing import minmax_scaling # plotting modules import seaborn as sns import matplotlib.pyplot as plt # read in all our data kickstarters_2017 = pd.read_csv("../input/kickstarter-projects/ks-projects-201801.csv") # set seed for reproducibility np.random.seed(0)
